author: epg
msg: * subversion/svnserve/serve.c
(log_fs_warning): Oops, declare len apr_size_t, as that's what
svn_io_file_write wants.

author: epg
msg: Separate svn_log__checkout from svn_log__update and log
checkout/update separately in svnserve.
UNTESTED
* subversion/include/private/svn_log.h
* subversion/libsvn_subr/log.c
Add svn_log__checkout, split out from svn_log__update.
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/reports/update.c
(dav_svn__update_report): Move the checkout detection back in here
from svn_log__update, where it made no sense to be.
* subversion/svnserve/serve.c
(report_driver_baton_t): Add new entry_counter and only_empty_entries
fields so update() can distinguish checkout from update.
(set_path): Increment b->entry_counter and set b->only_empty_entries
FALSE if !start_empty.
(link_path): Increment b->entry_counter.
(accept_report): Take new only_empty_entry argument to indicate to
callers who ask (just update()) that only one entry was sent,
which is empty.  Initialize entry_counter and only_empty_entries
in the baton and use them to determine only_empty_entry.
(update): Use accept_report only_empty_entry to log checkout and
update separately.
(switch_cmd, status, diff): Pass NULL for only_empty_entry; don't care.
* TODO.branch
Once again, need to test that the mod_dav_svn log is still right.

author: pburba
msg: * STATUS: Add r30668 to r30644 group.  Change vote to +1 on the latter.

author: pburba
msg: Follow-up to r30644, fix single file merge bug that can segfault and/or lead
to corrupt mergeinfo.
Note: This should fix the merge_tests.py 17 and 22 failures on the debian
[fsfs] x [svn] buildbot.
* subversion/libsvn_client/merge.c
(do_file_merge): Reorder code a bit to ensure that --record-only merges
actually calculate mergeinfo_path.  This is passed to
update_wc_mergeinfo() at the end of the function when we finally record
mergeinfo.  Previously we passed an uninitialized value.

author: epg
msg: * subversion/svnserve/log-escape.c
Add file for log escaping functions copied from Apache httpd.
* subversion/svnserve/serve.c
Remove functions moved to log-escape.c
(log_fs_warning): Hard-code 8192 but say where it came from.
* subversion/svnserve/server.h
(escape_errorlog_item): Add prototype.
